staffDm.confirmSend: If you confirm this, any messages you send here within the next 48 hours will be sent to staff without any confirmation.
staffDm.noConfirmWarn: Any messages you send here within the next 48 hours will be sent to staff without any confirmation.
staffDm.confirmation: Are you sure you want to send this message to staff?
staffDm.messageSent: 已发送信息给工作人员
staffDm.resendInfo: If you still want to talk to staff, resend it and click the ✅ button to confirm.

errors.falseUUID: 此 UUID 没有对应的玩家！
errors.noPlayer: 该玩家从未游玩过 Hypixel！
errors.notVerified: That user hasn't linked their Hypixel account yet!
errors.disabled: This command has been temporarily disabled.
errors.noPermission: 你无权在该频道使用此命令！
errors.apiError: 联系 API 时出现问题！

roles.noLevel: You must be at least chat level %%level%% to receive this role! You can check your current chat level using %%command%% in %%channel%%.
roles.successTake: Successfully took the %%role%% role from you!

timeLeft: 你可以在 %%timestamp%% 后再次使用 %%command%%。
wrongStringURL: 你发送的链接指向 Crowdin 在线编辑器本身，而非特定字符串！
example: 点击下方图片上显示的按钮以获取正确的字符串 URL。正确格式应为：%%url%%
reminderLang: 不要忘记将链接修改为 %%format%% 格式。

tips.ib: 试试 Inhale Banana 语言吧，执行 %%langIb%% 命令即可！
tips.translators: I need translators! Find out how to become a bot translator by executing %%translate%%.
tips.prefix: Do you wanna have a cool prefix on your nickname? Execute %%prefix%% in %%bots%% and follow the instructions! Available to all Hypixel translators.
tips.enen: Don't forget to change your string links to en-en!
tips.xp: You get random amounts of XP every minute when you're chatting, which will eventually make you level up.
tips.guide: Did you know we have a guide on how to get started with Crowdin, available for all translators? Check it out at %%gettingStarted%%, it has some useful tips!
tips.twitter: Have you followed our twitter account? Check it out at %%twitter%%!
tips.rulesInfo: %%rules%% and %%serverInfo%% have all the info you need about this server!
tips.fixTranslation: Found a mistake in a translation? Contact a proofreader for your language or let people know in a translation channel.
tips.pinnedInfo: Did you know most channels have important information pinned? You should check it out every time you visit one!
tips.hypixelStats: You can view information about a specific player on Hypixel by executing %%hypixelstats%%!
tips.languageStats: Did you know you can view statistics for any language on all of our projects? Just execute %%languagestats%%!
tips.rolesChange: Did you recently get new roles on Crowdin or join one of the projects we support? Execute %%verify%% to have your roles updated!
tips.botTranslated: Did you know our bot is available in multiple languages? Try executing %%langList%% to see a list of all the languages we currently support and you may just find your own!
tips.botUpdates: We post every major update to the bot or important news about it on %%botUpdates%%, check it out!
tips.moreTips: 我们需要更多提示！你可以通过 %%feedback%% 命令来提交。

pagination.notYours: You cannot interact with this menu! Execute %%command%% yourself to do this.
pagination.timeOut: This menu has timed out. If you wish to use it again, execute %%command%%.
